body:
INSERT INTO dbo.CRM_POS_PAYMENT_ON_BEHALF_PUSH
    (
         CRMID
       , CRMCode
       , VendorCode
       , TotalAmount
       , Fee
       , CreateDate
       , U_ShpCod
       , U_CrdCod
       , U_EplCod
       , U_Desc
       , U_MoCash
       , U_MoCCad
       , U_Acbank
       , U_CTLKCode
       , U_TypCre
       , U_NumCre
       , U_MoVoCh
       , U_NumVch
       , U_NaVoch
       , U_AcVoch
       , U_MoTran
       , U_BankTs
       , U_AccNum
       , U_AccName
       , IsAutoCard
       , Card_Fee
       , CardFeeTM
       , UpdatedDate
       , PushStatus
       , POSMsg
       , POSURCT
       , mPOSDocNum
       , Status
       , ServiceName
       , ReceiverPersionID
       , SenderPersionID
       , Phone
    )
SELECT
      P.ID
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR, P.ID)
	, CASE WHEN P.Pay_Type = 1 THEN N'0049' WHEN P.Pay_Type = 3 THEN N'0041' END
	, P.U_Tmoney
	, P.U_Fee
	, P.CreateDate
	, P.From_ShopCode
	, 0
	, ''
	, ''
	, O.CashAmount
	, O.CardAmount
	, O.CardPaymentMethod
	, O.U_CTLKCode
	, O.CreditCardType
	, O.CreditCardNumber
	, O.VoucherAmount
	, O.VoucherNumber
	, O.VoucherName
	, O.VoucherAccount
	, O.TransferAmount
	, O.BankCode
	, O.BankAccountNumber
	, O.BankAccountName
	, 'N'
	, 0
	, 0
	, ''
	, NULL
	, 1
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, O.CreditCardNumber
	, 0
	, 0
	, P.Mpos_ID
	, P.U_status
	, N'Chuyển tiền ViettelPay'
	, P.CardID_Receiver
	, P.CardID_Sender
	, P.U_Phone_Sender
FROM
    dbo.Pay_Services P (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.URCT O (NOLOCK)
			ON P.ID = O.DocEntry
				AND O.U_Type = P.Pay_Type
WHERE
    P.ID IN ($CURSOR$)
    AND P.Pay_Type = 2
